Implementation of the provisions of this section shall not alter the repayment obligation of any
			 other long-term water service or repayment contractor receiving water from
			 the Central Valley Project, or shift any costs that would otherwise have
			 been properly assignable to any contractors absent this section, including
			 operations and maintenance costs, construction costs, or other capitalized
			 costs incurred after the date of enactment of this Act, to other such
			 contractors.
